name: Small Fishing Game DX2: Even Fish want to fall in Love
name_original: Small Fishing Game DX2: Even Fish want to fall in Love
description:
Small fish game for BC Game Jam 2022.

Enjoy this romance-packed visual novel and try to get a good catch as you live your new life as a fish.

Credits:

  • Raoul Crosby
  • Colin To
  • Lydia Zheng
  • Samuel Wong
  • Daniel Orozco
